custom-sql.sql: SELECT DISTINCT {Koroneiki_ExternalLink.*} FROM Koroneiki_ExternalLink WHERE Koroneiki_ExternalLink.domain LIKE ? GROUP BY Koroneiki_ExternalLink.domain

SELECT DISTINCT {Koroneiki_ExternalLink.*} FROM Koroneiki_ExternalLink WHERE (Koroneiki_ExternalLink.domain LIKE ?) AND (Koroneiki_ExternalLink.entityName LIKE ?) GROUP BY Koroneiki_ExternalLink.entityName
